title: Sceptre 24" Professional Thin 75Hz 1080p LED Monitor 2x HDMI VGA Build-in Speakers, Machine Black (E248W-19203R Series)
description:
About this item 24 Ultra slim profile Contemporary sleek metallic design Slim bezel with thin chassis Audio will play from HDMI there are also built in speakers and you can also attach your own speakers or use headphones 2 x HDMI Ports convertible to DVI VESA wall mount ready Mounting type VESA Hole Pattern 100mm x 100mm Up to 75Hz Refresh Rate Fast Response Time
--------SHOPPIEM_BOUNDARY--------
Display Resolution Maximum: 1920 x 1080 Pixels
--------SHOPPIEM_BOUNDARY--------
Whether you are a gamer or a movie buff the Sceptre E248W19203R monitor is the way to go 1080P resolution 1920 x 1080 pixels delivers stunning color and picture detail on a 22 inch screen A 5 millisecond response time displays action sequences with the highest Degree of clarity Enjoy HDMI and VGA inputs to connect all video and gaming devices
--------SHOPPIEM_BOUNDARY--------
From the manufacturer Provides a crisper picture by preventing the backlight from flickering periodically Adaptive Sync ON Adaptive Sync is a technology that closes the gap between the graphics cards and the monitors refresh rates eliminating image tearing and stuttering in the process 75Hz Refresh Rate With 75Hz refresh rate images change faster and smoother than the standard reducing screen tearing Fast Response Time Fast response times reduce ghosting  blurring while transitioning pixels always keeping the enemy  terrain precisely in focus during chaotic moments Two HDMI and One VGA port provide up to 75HZ refresh rate refining picture clarity in all actionpacked gaming sequences and graphic design projects Audio In and a Headphone Jack provide diverse audio options Perfectly suited to work  gaming settings builtin speakers deliver robust  smooth audio while saving space on your desk The VESA wall mount pattern gives you the freedom to select the optimum viewing position for your monitor eliminate cable clutter and save valuable space for your gaming and work station Blue Light Shift Blue Light Shift reduces blue light allowing you to comfortably work watch or play applications without straining your eyes Security Lock Ready The monitor has a security slot allowing you to securely fasten your monitor in place effectively preventing theft Security Lock not included
